com.avaje.ebean.config.dbplatform

Class DbDdlSyntax

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.avaje.ebean.config.dbplatform.DbDdlSyntax
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MsSqlServer2005Platform.MsDdlSyntax, PostgresDdlSyntax

    public class DbDdlSyntax
extends Object
    Used to support DB specific syntax for DDL generation.

      Return true to is constraints are disabled on each table.
      boolean isInlinePrimaryKeyConstraint()
      Return true if primary key constraints should be inlined when they are a single column.
      boolean isRenderIndexForFkey()
      Return true if indexes should be created for the foreign keys.

      • getIdentitySuffix

        public String getIdentitySuffix()
        Typically returns empty string but for SQLite and perhaps others the Identity/AutoIncrement clause comes after the primary key clause.

      • setIdentitySuffix

        public void setIdentitySuffix(String identitySuffix)
        Set the identity clause that would appear after the primary key clause.

        Only used for SQLite at this stage.
